Mexican food should be bursting with flavor, and this has none.  I had a carne asada burrito and the meat had no seasoning and a chewy texture.  There was no sauce of any kind in the burrito, but there were a selection to add.  After living in California for five years, I came to love burritos.  This is nothing like a taco truck burrito.  This is another sad example of food that is supposed to be tasty being completely watered down.
